issue.title: [C++] Third party download URLs are duplicated
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6333](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6333). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently, third-party source download URLs are specified in both `cpp/thirdparty/versions.txt` and `cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdPartyToolchain.cmake`. It would be nice to find a way to deduplicate the information.
